flawed_nl_solution:
Cheese pizzas are 2/3 of the pizza's purchased because 2 / (2+1) = 2/3
She buys 18/2 cheese pizzas because 6 x (2/3) = <<6*2/3=18/2>>18/2
These give her 162 pieces of cheese pizza because 18/2 x 18 = <<18/2*18=162>>162
The students at 154 pieces of cheese because 162 - 8 = <<162-8=154>>154
There are 77 students in her class because 154 / 2 = <<154/2=77>>77
#### 77

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 18/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
